brief_description: Single coyote observed investigating yard and garbage bins
full_description: Security camera detected medium-sized coyote entering backyard from eastern fence line. Animal spent approximately 4 minutes investigating area around garbage bins and compost. Subject description: - Species: Coyote (Canis latrans) - Size: Medium, typical adult - Condition: Healthy appearance, good coat - Behavior: Alert but not aggressive, showed typical scavenging behavior - Movement: Entered via east fence, departed same way - Duration: Present from 03:15 to 03:19 - Note: Third coyote sighting this month, may indicate growing habituation to area
